channel.title: Comments on: Papkuilsfontein: the perfect guest farm

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/papkuilsfontein-the-perfect-guest-farm/#comment-305">Annette Drogi</a>.
Hi Annette, I would love to go back in spring and see the masses of blooms. It was a beautiful spot in late summer, so I'm sure it will be incredible in spring!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Annette Drogi.

Hi Annette, I would love to go back in spring and see the masses of blooms. It was a beautiful spot in late summer, so I’m sure it will be incredible in spring!

item.title: By: Annette Drogi
item.dc:creator: Annette Drogi
item.description: We just came back from a flower trip up Namaqualand - and on our last day we drove via Nieuwoudtville and up the gravel road to Papkuilsf. - had a pretty foto in mind in the Greenwood guide with nice flowers. What an amazing experience... You MUST try to get there once in a lifetime in SPRING !!! A sea of yellow.... Words can´t describe it properly. WHAT A PLACE !!!!
item.content:encoded:
We just came back from a flower trip up Namaqualand – and on our last day we drove via Nieuwoudtville and up the gravel road to Papkuilsf. – had a pretty foto in mind in the Greenwood guide with nice flowers. What an amazing experience…
You MUST try to get there once in a lifetime in SPRING !!! A sea of yellow….
Words can´t describe it properly. WHAT A PLACE !!!!

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/papkuilsfontein-the-perfect-guest-farm/#comment-303">Kerry</a>.
Good to hear not much has changed and it's still the same amazing place you remember!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kerry.

Good to hear not much has changed and it’s still the same amazing place you remember!

item.title: By: Kerry
item.dc:creator: Kerry
item.description: Aaaah, how awesome to see this place again! I stayed here with my family over 15 years ago, when I was still a kid and it´s so great to see that not much has changed... the pool wasn´t there then, but everything else looks more or less the same! What great memories.
item.content:encoded: Aaaah, how awesome to see this place again! I stayed here with my family over 15 years ago, when I was still a kid and it´s so great to see that not much has changed… the pool wasn´t there then, but everything else looks more or less the same! What great memories.
